ModMetaData.name: Biomes! Core
ModMetaData.author: The Biomes Mod Team
ModMetaData.description:
The core module for the Biomes! mods. Necessary for all of the Biomes! modules.
[BiomesKit](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2153006237) is included by default.
[[XND] Nocturnal Animals](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2269731409) is included by default.
